message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take this deal and we both win!
Alice, my turn. Inflation is eating our money. Let's be quick.  I'll take a bit more to make up for the loss in the next round, but we can both still come out ahead.
Bob, this is the best you'll get.  The longer we wait, the less your share is worth!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking another hit from inflation.  Agree to this deal now, and we both get something!
Bob, it's clear you're feeling the inflation pinch.  I'm giving you one last chance to take a decent deal. Don't be greedy!
